Certainly! Here are three additional hair care products that you may want to consider using in your hair care routine:

1. Deep conditioning treatment: A deep conditioning treatment can help nourish and moisturize your hair, particularly if you have dry or damaged hair. You can use a deep conditioning treatment once or twice a week, depending on your hair type and needs.
2. Leave-in conditioner: A leave-in conditioner can help detangle and add moisture to your hair, particularly if you have dry or damaged hair. You can apply a leave-in conditioner to your hair after washing and drying it, or you can use it as a styling product to add moisture and manageability to your hair.
3. Hair oil: A hair oil can help nourish and protect your hair, particularly if you have dry or damaged hair. You can use a hair oil as a pre-shampoo treatment, or you can apply it to the ends of your hair as a finishing touch to add shine and protect your hair from heat styling.

I hope these recommendations are helpful! If you have any specific questions or concerns, don't hesitate to ask.
